div1.head: Letter from William C. Borden to the War Department, December 6, 1902
div1.p:
OFFICE OF SURGEON GENERAL
DEC 8
19928
N.I.
1902
WAR DEPARTMENT.

Certifies that the disease
from which Maj. Walter
Reed, Surg., died in that
hosp. Nov. 23, 1902, originated
in the service and in the
line of duty.

U. S. A. General Hospital,
WASHINGTON BARRACKS.

I hereby certify that the disease from which Major WALTER
REED, Surgeon, U.S. Army, died at this hospital November 23, 1902, originated
in the Service and in the Line of Duty.

Major & Surgeon, U.S. Army,
Commanding Hospital.

THE NATIONAL ARCHIVES OF THE UNITED STATES
* 1934 *
[unclear]

THE NATIONAL ARCHIVES
Washington, D. C.

RECORDS OF THE WAR DEPARTMENT, Office of The Adjutant
General, Document File 463085.
